description.short: Touch Bar with integrated Touch ID sensor, 13.3-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit Retina Display with IPS technology; 2560-by-1600, 10 Hours Battery
description.long: 500 nits brightness, 2.4GHz quad-core Intel Core i5, 256GB, 8GB of 2133MHz LPDDR3 onboard memory. Full-size backlit keyboard, Bluetooth 5.0 wireless technology, Stereo speakers with high dynamic range, Three microphones, 3.5 mm headphone jack, Up to 10 hours on the web, Built-in 58.0-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery
